name: Red Bud Restaurant 紫荆阁
address: 8360 Granville Ave, Richmond, BC V6Y 1P3, Canada

hasMenuItem.name: Baked Pork Loin w/Tomato Sauce & Cheese on Rice 芝士鮮茄焗豬扒飯
hasMenuItem.description: Tender pork loin baked with rich tomato sauce and melted cheese, served over a bed of rice.

hasMenuItem.name: Baked Spaghetti Bolognese 芝士焗肉醬意粉
hasMenuItem.description: Tender spaghetti topped with rich bolognese sauce, baked with a generous layer of melted cheese.

hasMenuItem.description: Curry choice of beef slices, chicken, or vegetables, served with options of rice, mashed potatoes, spaghetti, French fries, stir-fried or steamed vegetables.

hasMenuItem.name: Baked Portuguese Style Chicken on Rice 葡汁椰香雞柳焗飯
hasMenuItem.description: Tender chicken strips baked with creamy Portuguese-style coconut sauce over rice, topped with melted cheese and garnished with vegetables.

hasMenuItem.name: Hainan Chicken (Half) 海南雞(半隻)
hasMenuItem.description: Half.

hasMenuItem.name: Spaghetti Bolognese w/Pan Fried Egg 煎蛋肉醬燴意粉
hasMenuItem.description: Tender spaghetti topped with rich Bolognese sauce, crowned with a perfectly pan-fried egg and garnished with a sprinkle of fresh herbs.

hasMenuItem.name: 2 Items 2 款
hasMenuItem.description: Choose two items from an array of proteins including charbroiled lamb, baked salmon with unique sauces, grilled beef tongue, and more. Sides include fries, mashed potatoes, or vegetables. Soup options feature cream of mushroom or Russian borsch.

hasMenuItem.name: Pan-Fried Chicken Filet & Sausage w/Black Pepper Sauce 黑椒雞扒歐陸腸
hasMenuItem.description: Pan-fried chicken filet & sausage in black pepper sauce. Optional sides: spaghetti, rice, fries, mashed potato, mixed vegetables (fried or steamed).

hasMenuItem.name: 1 Item 1 款
hasMenuItem.description: Choose one main and a side: Options include charbroiled lamb rack, New York steak, baked salmon with garlic, various pan-fried proteins, and baked fish with mushroom & cheese. Choice of fries, mashed potatoes, rice, spaghetti, or vegetables. Soup options: cream of mushroom or Russian borsch.

hasMenuItem.description: French toast served with a drizzle of syrup and a pat of butter on top.

hasMenuItem.description: Toasted bread layers filled with ham, egg, cheese, and bacon, accompanied by french fries.

review.reviewBody: messed up my order but recieved one whole dish I didnt order. Thanks I guess
Wish they can specific curry and any dishes  has peanut in it. Peanut allergy is common here.
food was super salty and cold
